item.title: At a Capitol Hill church, mourners gather at a vigil for Charlie Kirk
item.description: More than 150 people gathered to remember the conservative political figure, who was fatally shot during a campus event.

item.title: In Trump’s White House, Charlie Kirk’s killing is deeply personal
item.description: The conservative founder of Turning Point USA animated a generation of young activists and was on a first-name basis with most of the West Wing.

item.title: House passes $892.6 billion defense bill over Democrats’ protests
item.description: The vote, mostly along party lines, lost Democratic support as the GOP rebuffed efforts to rein in President Donald Trump’s domestic military agenda.

item.title: Charlie Kirk, fiery voice in conservative politics, killed at 31
item.description: Charlie Kirk, 31, built one of the most influential organizations on the right, turning viral debate moments into fuel for Turning Point’s rapid growt...

item.title: Trump administration will resume plans for federal charity drive
item.description: The move comes after pushback from charities who had opposed ending the longstanding tradition of charitable giving from the federal workforce.
